statements.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM E3_CUSTOMER WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #customerId#

SELECT CUSTOMER_ID , CUSTOMER_TYPE , (select code_name from E3_CODE a where a.code_id = c.CUSTOMER_TYPE) as CUSTOMER_TYPE_NAME , CUSTOMER_NAME , POSTAL_CODE , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , USE_YN , ETC FROM E3_CUSTOMER c WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchCustomerId#), '%') AND CUSTOMER_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchCustomerType#), '%') AND CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchCustomerName#), '%') AND USE_YN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchUseYn#), '%') ORDER BY CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_ID ASC
statements.insert: INSERT INTO E3_CUSTOMER (CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_TYPE, CUSTOMER_NAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ETC, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DATE) VALUES (#customerId#, #customerType#, #customerName#, #address1#, #address2#, #etc#, #useYn#, #LoginedUserID#, SYSDATE)
statements.update: UPDATE E3_CUSTOMER SET CUSTOMER_TYPE = #customerType# ,CUSTOMER_NAME = #customerName# ,ADDRESS1 = #address1# ,ADDRESS2 = #address2# ,ETC = #etc# ,USE_YN = #useYn# ,MOD_ID = #LoginedUserID# ,MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #customerId#
